snippet: Are allergies a blessing in disguise? A profile of Margie Profet in the latest issue of Psychology Today explores her novel theories of allergies and her mysterious disappearance.
abstract: Are allergies a blessing in disguise? A profile of Margie Profet in the latest issue of Psychology Today explores her novel theories of allergies and her mysterious disappearance.

headline.main: Allergies as a Blessing in Disguise
